message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.DS 

The paper deals with the problem of controlling linear time-invariant systems with known noisy dynamics and adversarially chosen quadratic losses, which is a problem in control theory. However, the paper proposes an online learning algorithm to solve this problem, which falls under the category of machine learning. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with the steady-state distribution of the system, which is a concept in control theory and falls under the category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper proposes an algorithm that relies on a novel SDP relaxation, which is a technique used in optimization and falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of controlling a system, which is a problem in robotics, and falls under the category of cs.RO (Robotics).
